Career Objective:
To work for an organization where my technical and professional skills are best utilized in a 
progressive employer-employee relationship based on growth, development and mutual benefit. 
To strive for excellence while overcoming challenges and contribute in dynamic manner as part 
of a team towards achieving organizational goals to meet targets and objectives under any 
circumstances.
Career Summary:
Civil Engineer Graduate with 10 years  of progressively responsible experience in supervision, 
execution, planning and coordination of high-rise buildings, independent floors, villas, etc. 
Possessing a comprehensive knowledge of planning and executing projects to required 
specifications, focusing on economy, safety, reliability, quality and sustainability.Currently 
designated as Senior Project Engineer with Impetus Engineers Projects Private Limited., 
Delhi, India.
Proficiency:
►
Polite & dedicated Team Player with high tolerance & patience level, and good inter-
communication & interpersonal skills.
►

: 
Milestone Experion Centre
Project location                       :  
32nd Milestone On National highway 8,
Gurgaon(Haryana), India 
Project Cost

Working from

May 2014- present
                        
Project detail:
Located on the main highway, this is a commercial center which is being developed over 
approximately four acres of prime licensed land parcel, having total built-up area of 
approximately 40,000 m2. The twelve storied multi-user commercial development targeted to 
USGBC (United States Green Building Council) LEED GOLD rating is aimed to offer retail and 
commercial spaces with all requisite amenities.
Job Responsibilities
 
 : 

Planning, proper execution, monitoring & coordination b/w the different agencies at the site,
with seniors as well as to the head office for smooth progress of the project.

Looking after execution of structure as well as finishing work.

Coordinate b/w the different agencies at the site for the physical  progress of project.

Ensure the building layout is as per drawing.

Understand the GFC drawing and carry out the works on the field as per the same.

Get the layout of footing, column & slab done as per drawing.

Check line, level, profile of formwork done for footing, column & slab as per drawing.

Ensure Reinforcement used in footing, column, slab as per Drawings, BBS.

Check Brick work in accordance to floor plan and door & window schedule.

Check Plaster as per method statement.

Tracking Progress on daily basis as per Schedule.

Discuss & relay critical points with client's staffs regarding project design execution, 
material delivery, etc. in a timely manner.

Oversee works as per quality and safety guidelines.


Discussion with own & client's staff for next day’s, weekly & monthly target & how to 
achieve that target.

Monitoring the lags & finding/creating alternate ways to minimize those lags. 

Preparing milestone chart & properly tracking it.

Project detail:
Wave City - A first of its kind project that truly personifies the concept of creating a city that 
thinks for you. Spread across 4500 acres, Wave City is one of India’s largest self-sufficient Hi-
Tech City based on “Hi-Tech City Concept”.
This mix land use project encompasses independent floors, villas, high-rise apartments and 
planned future commercial development. Further it boasts of more than 750 acres of green 
spaces, wide roads and congestion-free BRT network for smooth traffic flow, health care 
provisions including hospitals, medical university, ISKCON Temple, educational institutions, 
local shopping centers, malls and multiplexes, etc. It is a city full of vigor and vitality, which 
makes it the perfect place to enjoy a comfortable, convenient and uncluttered lifestyle.
Job Responsibilities


Check Brick work in accordance to floor plan and door & window schedule.

Project detail:
It’s a multi-storied residential project spread over 5 acres of land in DLF Phase-V, Gurgaon.
The project consists of 4 High-rise buildings (2B+G+19), a club & aesthetically landscaped 
gardens.
Job Responsibilities
 
 : 

Planning, proper execution, monitoring & coordination b/w the different agencies at the site,
with seniors as well as to the head office up to handing over of the apartments to the 
respective clients and building services to Maintenance Department.

Looking after execution of  finishing work.

Coordinate b/w the different agencies at the site for the physical  progress of project.

Coordinate b/w the different agencies at the site for proper handing over of the apartments 
to the respective clients.

Monitoring the lags & finding/creating alternate ways to minimize those lags. 

Preparing snag lists(of own as well as the clients) & coordinating with different agencies to 
remove those snags for the satisfactory handover of the respective apartments to the clients.

Discussion with seniors & contractor’s staff for next day’s, weekly & monthly target & how
to achieve that target.

Verify and certify contractor’s work status at the end of each month.

Preparing milestone chart & properly tracking it. 

Preparing & keeping records of Daily, Weekly & Monthly progress as well as Manpower 
report.

A commercial cum retail project with 5 towers(up to G+27 floors),1 hotel block , 2 multi level car

with plans for mega expansions in further phases.
